articles.author: Adam Bankhurst
articles.title: You Probably Shouldn't Peel Off the Protective Screen on Your New Switch - OLED Model - IGN
articles.description: PSA: Nintendo has confirmed that new Switch - OLED Model owners should not remove the protective screen that is already on the system as it will help prevent any harm from being done to the user should the glass screen break.
articles.content: As many around the world have begun enjoying their brand-new Nintendo Switch - OLED Models, some have noticed that it comes with a protective screen already on it. According to Nintendo, it should no… [+1987 chars]
